quotations.label: Quotations
quotations.comment:
Cart2Quote (Version 6.3.1) Provided by Ophirah | E-commerce Projects

For documentation and support visit cart2quote.zendesk.com or contact support@cart2quote.com

active_c2q_tmpl.label: Use Built-in Template Files
active_c2q_tmpl.comment: Set to NO to disable the front-end functionality of Cart2Quote or when manually copying Cart2Quote template and layout information into a custom theme.

layout_update_detailpage_activated.label: Product Page Activation
layout_update_detailpage_activated.comment: Show or hide the “Add To Quote” button on the product detail page.

layout_update_listgrid_activated.label: Category Page Activation
layout_update_listgrid_activated.comment: Show or hide the “Add To Quote” button on the product list/grid page.

ajax_add.label: Ajax Add to Quote
ajax_add.comment: Opens Ajax popup when adding products to a Quote Request.

quick_quote_mode.label: Enable Quick Quote
quick_quote_mode.comment: Set to Yes to send the quote request directly from the product detail page. Cart2Quote Business license or higher required. (Upgrade)

layout_disable_all_order_references.label: Hide Order References
layout_disable_all_order_references.comment: Hide order buttons and references on quote submit page. To disable order functionality please use Not2Order.

layout_disable_trier_option.label: Disable Qty Tier Request
layout_disable_trier_option.comment: Hide option to request quotes for multiple quantities per item.

redirect_to_quotation.label: After Adding a Product Redirect to Quotation List

disable_exist_account_check.label: Registration Mode
disable_exist_account_check.comment: Cart2Quote will check the form for a known emailaddres. When a login is not required for existing users, the user will also not be logged in automatically after a quote is submitted.

enable_quote_direct_print.label: Enable Direct Print
enable_quote_direct_print.comment: Print PDF Quote directly from frontend quote list. For logged in visitors only. Cart2Quote Enterprise license or higher required. (Upgrade)

require_shipping_groups.label: Require Billing Details for Customer Groups
require_shipping_groups.comment: Select usergroups that do not have to specify their shipping details. For customers that belong to this usergroup the "require shipping details" setting will be ignored.

require_billing_groups.label: Require Billing Details for Customer Groups
require_billing_groups.comment: Select usergroups that do not have to specify their billing details. For customers that belong to this usergroup the "require billing details" setting will be ignored.

hide_shipping_quote.label: Disable Shipping Estimator
hide_shipping_quote.comment: When shipping and billing address both aren't required, the Shipping Estimator is always hidden.

state.label: State
state.comment: For some countries such as Canada and the United States Magento is preconfigured to require the customer to specify the state.

enable_file_upload.label: Enable File Upload
enable_file_upload.comment: Cart2Quote Enterprise license or higher required. (Upgrade)

quote_form_customization.label: Custom Fields (Beta)
quote_form_customization.comment: Cart2Quote Enterprise license or higher required. (Upgrade)

extrafield_1_group.label: Custom Field 1 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_1_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_2_group.label: Custom Field 2 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_2_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_3_group.label: Custom Field 3 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_3_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_4_group.label: Custom Field 4 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_4_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_5_group.label: Custom Field 5 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_5_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_6_group.label: Custom Field 6 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_6_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_7_group.label: Custom Field 7 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_7_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_8_group.label: Custom Field 8 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_8_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_9_group.label: Custom Field 9 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_9_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_10_group.label: Custom Field 10 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_10_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_11_group.label: Custom Field 11 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_11_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

extrafield_12_group.label: Custom Field 12 Show on Group(s)
extrafield_12_group.comment: Select usergroups to show only these groups this form field

send_linked_sale_bcc.label: Send BCC to Linked Sales Representative
send_linked_sale_bcc.comment: The Magento Admin User email of the linked sales representative will be used. Cart2Quote Enterprise license and higher required. (Upgrade)

proposal_reminder.label: Reminder Proposal Template
proposal_reminder.comment: Select email to be sent. Enterprise edition only.

pdf.label: Enable PDF Proposal
pdf.comment: The price proposal will also be attached as PDF.

short_desc.label: Add Product Short Description Text to PDF

doc.label: Enable Standard Document
doc.comment: Upload any file as default attachment to the proposal email. (i.e. Terms and Conditions) NOTE: Some providers limit the size of emails.

fields.expirtime_proposal: Default Expiration Time Proposals text 39892123 20 1 1 1 In days. <input type="hidden" value="201151429" class="article_id"/> qquoteadv/adminhtml_system_config_form_tooltipfield

send_reminder.label: Default Reminder Notice
send_reminder.comment: In days. Set to "0" to disable this feature. This notice is available in the Cart2Quote Enterprise edition. (Upgrade)

auto_proposal.label: Auto Proposal
auto_proposal.comment: Price proposals are sent automatically, based on standard catalog prices including price tiers. Cart2Quote Business license and higher required. (Upgrade)

auto_proposal_quote_total.label: Maximum subtotal for auto proposal
auto_proposal_quote_total.comment: Set a max amount for Cart2Quote to send a proposal automatically. Quote requests above this amount (grand total) will have to be answered manually.

auto_proposal_quote_qty.label: Maximum qty for auto proposal
auto_proposal_quote_qty.comment: Set a max qty for Cart2Quote to send a proposal automatically. Quote requests above this total qty will have to be answered manually.

auto_proposal_shipping_type.label: Select Shipping Type
auto_proposal_shipping_type.comment: The shipping will automatically be set to quote if the shipping is available.

auto_proposal_shipping_price.label: Shipping Price
auto_proposal_shipping_price.comment: Configure a default shipping price per item or per quote.

quoteconfirmation.label: Lock Proposal
quoteconfirmation.comment: Proposal items cannot be removed or added from quote via the shopping cart.

itemprice.label: Show Items Price
itemprice.comment: Disable to hide individual item prices in PDF, email and customer dashboard by default. (Only show totals)

adjustment.label: Show Quote Adjustment to Customers
adjustment.comment: Total quote discount will be visible for customers in the Proposal total block.

profit.label: Allow Negative Profit
profit.comment: When enabled quote proposals can be sent with negative profit.

qquoteadv_remark.label: Set Standard (Fixed) Remark with Proposal
qquoteadv_remark.comment: Add remark that appears in new proposal email and in the quote proposal PDF.

fields.prefix:
Default Quote Prefix text 10a 0 0 1 <input type="hidden" value="201151559" class="article_id"/> qquoteadv/adminhtml_system_config_form_tooltipfield
2

pad_length.label: Pad Length
pad_length.comment: Desired number length without the prefix. Set to 0 to not add leading zeros to doc number.

fields.prefix_website:
Default Quote Prefix text 10a 0 1 0 <input type="hidden" value="201151559" class="article_id"/> qquoteadv/adminhtml_system_config_form_tooltipfield
1

pad_length_website.label: Pad Length
pad_length_website.comment: Desired number length without the prefix. Set to 0 to not add leading zeros to doc number.

fields.prefix_default: Default Quote Prefix text 10a 1 0 0 <input type="hidden" value="201151559" class="article_id"/> qquoteadv/adminhtml_system_config_form_tooltipfield

pad_length_default.label: Pad Length
pad_length_default.comment: Desired number length without the prefix. Set to 0 to not add leading zeros to doc number.

auto_assign_rotate.label: Assign Sales Representative
auto_assign_rotate.comment: New quotes are assigned automatically, rotating the admin users in the auto assign role below.

auto_assign_role.label: Auto Assign Role
auto_assign_role.comment: Admin users with this role and with an active status are used to assign new quote request to based on rotation.

auto_assign_previous.label: Sticky Sales Representative
auto_assign_previous.comment: Assign quotes from existing customers to the sales representative who is linked to the previous request from the customer. This overwrites the auto assign role.

auto_assign_login.label: Assign Quote to Logged in Sales Representative
auto_assign_login.comment: Cart2Quote Business license and higher required. (Upgrade)

limit_available_salesrep.label: Limit available Sales Representatives
limit_available_salesrep.comment: When enabled, you can select and exclude sales reps that can be assigned via the backend quote view.

default_cart2quote_attribute_value.label: Default 'Allowed to Quote Mode' Value for New Products

force_log.label: Enable Email Logging
force_log.comment: Enable logging when you have issues sending emails. Make sure Magento logging is enabled.

upload_folder.label: Subfolder for File Uploads
upload_folder.comment: Give subdirectory name to use within store media folder to store file uploads. Default is 'qquoteadv', without trailing slash.

followup.label: Follow-up in Grid
followup.comment: Follow-up button in quotation grid will filter quotes to this setting.

customer_name_select.label: Customer Name Dropdown
customer_name_select.comment: Creates select box in quote overview. May result in memory problems for large amount of customers.

calculate_quote_totals_on_load.label: Calculate Totals on Page Load
calculate_quote_totals_on_load.comment: Important Setting this option to yes will increase page load time.

force_original_product_price.label: Force Original Product Price on Edit Products
force_original_product_price.comment:
When an admin edits the products on a quote, the original price can be overwritten by the custom price. This options disables that.
NOTE: It uses the default product price and doesn't use any vat/tax/multi-currency calculation.

link_auto_login.label: Auto User Login
link_auto_login.comment: Adds links to proposal email that enable automatic user login - only available in Business and Enterprise edition.

auto_confirm.label: Use Auto Confirm Proposal
auto_confirm.comment: The checkout button in the proposal email, links directly to the checkout page. Select 'No' if you want customers to first visit the customer dashboard.

checkout_alternative_url.label: Alternative Checkout URL
checkout_alternative_url.comment: Enter alternative checkout url. NOTE: When using this feature, the quote items will NOT be placed in the shopping cart.

checkout_alternative_email.label: Proposal Email with Alternative Checkout Link
checkout_alternative_email.comment: Select email template to be used when the alternative checkout is used for the quote proposal.

confirmed_alternate.label: Checkout quotes with accepted status
confirmed_alternate.comment: When enabled a Quote with state accepted can still be checked out. This is a beta setting. Use at your own risk!

display_tierprices.label: Display product tier prices
display_tierprices.comment: When enabled, the tier prices are set to the quote automatically

mass_update_cart2quote_attribute_ranges.label: Product Id Ranges
mass_update_cart2quote_attribute_ranges.comment: Be sure to save if you have made any changes before you update.

default_quote_group_enabled.label: Use default allowed customer groups
default_quote_group_enabled.comment: Set default allowed customer groups when there aren't any set on the product

default_quote_group.label: Default allowed customer groups when no groups are configured on the product
default_quote_group.comment:
When no customer group is selected on the edit product page and quotation is enabled for that product, the groups that are set here are used.

If none are selected, all are allowed.
(This setting doesn't affect the mass update)

Cart2Quote Enterprise license and higher required. (Upgrade)

pdf_rendering.label: PDF Rendering
pdf_rendering.comment:
We leverage the Magento PDF rendering engine, ZendPDF, to render the quote PDF.
ZendPDF has some issues with PNG and GIF images, resulting in errors or affecting the load time.
We advise to use JPEG images for all images that are used in your quote PDF.
This will improve performance and decrease the PDF file size.

optimize_image_performance.label: Optimize Image Rendering
optimize_image_performance.comment: If "Optimize Image Rendering" is set to "Yes", we will convert any GIF or PNG to JPEG images on runtime. This will decrease the PDF file size and solve other issues concerning image rendering in ZendPDF.

alpha_channel.label: Alpha channel
alpha_channel.comment: Alpha channel that will replace transparent backgrounds. Must be a 6 character RGB value.

png.label: PNG Image Rendering
png.comment: ZendPDF does not render 32bit PNG images, 24bit PNG images take a long time to render and increase your file size. This option allows you to convert PNG images on runtime to an accepted format. We advise to not use PNG images at all but use JPEG images instead.

png_alpha.label: PNG Alpha channel
png_alpha.comment: Alpha channel that will replace transparent backgrounds. Must be a 6 character RGB value.

gif.label: GIF Image Rendering
gif.comment: GIF images are unsupported by ZendPDF, if GIF images are used in PDF rendering Magento will throw an error. We recommend that you DO NOT use GIF images. In case you do use GIF images, this setting gives you the opportunity to convert these on runtime.

gif_alpha.label: GIF Alpha channel
gif_alpha.comment: Alpha channel that will replace transparent backgrounds. Must be a 6 character RGB value.

save_space_on_fonts.label: Save space on fonts
save_space_on_fonts.comment: The default Magento PDF font will be replaced with Times New Roman to save approx. 2MB of space

beta.label: Beta Features
beta.comment: Overview of current beta features and to submit feedback, go to the Beta Forum.

apo.label: APO compatibility
apo.comment: If you are experiencing problems with MageWorx' Advanced Product Options, you could enable this setting. This is a beta setting, please test thorougly.

customerforcustomer.label: Customer for customer
customerforcustomer.comment: Customer can make quotes for other customer if this settings is enabled

customerforcustomer_group.label: Customer for customer only for Group(s)
customerforcustomer_group.comment: Customer can make quotes for other customer if the customer is in one of the selected groups

originalprice_requeststatus.label: Show original price on quotes that are waiting for price proposal

create_support_ticket.label: Create Support Ticket
create_support_ticket.comment:
When opening a support ticket, please do include the following information:

  • Your order number and Magento version number
  • Steps to reproduce the issue in your store
  • FTP/SSH login as well as Magento admin access (if relevant)
  • Screenshots with notes describing the issue
    • Create a support ticket here!

report_a_bug.label: Report a Bug
report_a_bug.comment:
When creating a bug report, please do include the following information:

  • Steps to reproduce the issue in your store
  • Screenshots with notes describing the issue
    • Report a bug here!
